name: com.geeklab.audiencelab-sdk
description: Audiencelab SDK is a set of utilities for development in Unity. It includes tools for handling deep links, collecting metrics, managing network requests, and much more.

samples.description: This sample shows how to use the Audiencelab SDK in a Unity game. It demonstrates tracking user actions and sending this data to Geeklab, helping developers start using the Audiencelab SDK in their own apps.
